markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Liberating Stride](/Feats.aspx?ID=248) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 114 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[liberator cause](/Causes.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

Instead of you taking a Step at the end of your Liberating Step, the triggering ally can Stride up to half their Speed. Even if you have exalt, only the triggering ally gains this benefit.
name: Liberating Stride
search_markdown:
<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 114 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[liberator cause](/Causes.aspx?ID=3)

</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Your allies can move farther when you release them from harm.
</summary>
summary: Your allies can move farther when you release them from harm.
summary_markdown: Your allies can move farther when you release them from harm.

Even if you have exalt, only the triggering ally gains this benefit.
